entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
